Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.dot.Element
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.dot.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends Element
    This class provides graphs in DOT.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
